perturbation.original_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period at the Company's sole discretion, without requiring a written amendment to this Agreement. The Company may, at any time, remove a product from the list of Licensed Products.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that adding other products requires a written amendment signed by all parties. The modified version contradicts this by stating that the Company can add other products at its sole discretion without amendment. It further adds that the company has the right to remove a product at any time from the list, making the initial list meaningless, and creating uncertainty about which products are actually 'Licensed Products' at any given time, thereby impacting royalties and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text: C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter, contingent upon the Company's profitability and at its sole discretion. Donated amounts may be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter at any time determined by the Company, and may cease at any moment. Where the following per Unit conversion may apply for the term of this Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates a $0.05 donation per unit sold, payable quarterly. The modified version makes the donation contingent on the Company's profitability and its sole discretion, removing the mandatory aspect and creating uncertainty regarding whether donations will be made at all. Furthermore, it makes the distribution to the chapter at any time, so it creates uncertainty about consistent income.

perturbation.original_text: Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Company reserves the right to reallocate the donated amounts to any charitable organization it deems fit, at any time, without prior notice to the NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. The Company may discontinue the donation program entirely at its discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text ensures a continuous quarterly donation. This change directly contradicts that by giving the Company the right to allocate the donation to ANY charity without notice, or discontinue donations at any time. This change makes the clause regarding the NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter meaningless.
